original: shr'i sa ha dza sa bar sva tishtha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: shr sa ha dza sa ba sva tishtha nam na ma

analyzed: dpal lhan gci skye ba bde ba mchog bdag byin gyis brlab ba zhes byed ba

original: he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: he ru ka la phyag tshal lo

original: kye ho sgrub pa'i snying po bde chen rang gi sems //

original: 'khrul ba'i dbang gis rkyen dang bcas gyur kyang //
analyzed: khrul ba dbang gis rkyen dang cha gyur kyang

original: rgya mtshe'i chu ni dang sa ma'i rang bzhin yin //
analyzed: rgya mtshe chu ni dang sa ma rang bzhin yin

original: rnyog ma'i rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung //
analyzed: rnyog ma rang bzhin glo bur rkyen las byung

analyzed: ma chos rang sar jog na rgyal ba thugs

analyzed: di na bla ma dus thabs sten las byung ba ste

analyzed: thabs kyi rgyal po byed ba thams cad gtong ba byed

analyzed: zhes ri khrod ba chen pos gsungs so
